eu.amidst.dynamic.models

Class DynamicBayesianNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.dynamic.models.DynamicBayesianNetwork
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class DynamicBayesianNetwork
extends Object
implements Serializable
    The DynamicBayesianNetwork class represents a Bayesian network model.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DynamicBayesianNetwork(DynamicDAG dynamicDAG1)
      Creates a new DynamicBayesianNetwork from a DynamicDAG object.
      DynamicBayesianNetwork(DynamicDAG dynamicDAG1, List<ConditionalDistribution> distsTime0, List<ConditionalDistribution> distsTimeT)
      Creates a new DynamicBayesianNetwork from a DynamicDAG and a list of distributions for both at Time 0 and T.

                              List<ConditionalDistribution> distsTime0,
                              List<ConditionalDistribution> distsTimeT)
        Creates a new DynamicBayesianNetwork from a DynamicDAG and a list of distributions for both at Time 0 and T.
        Parameters:
        dynamicDAG1 - a Dynamic directed acyclic graph.
        distsTime0 - a list of conditional probability distributions at Time 0.
        distsTimeT - a list of conditional probability distributions at Time T.

      • equalDBNs

        public boolean equalDBNs(DynamicBayesianNetwork bnet,
                         double threshold)
        Tests if two Dynamic Bayesian networks are equals. Two Dynamic Bayesian networks are considered equals if they have an equal conditional distribution for each variable at both Time 0 and T.
        Parameters:
        bnet - a given DynamicBayesianNetwork to be compared with this DynamicBayesianNetwork.
        threshold - a threshold value.
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if the two DynamicBNs are equals or not.
